title: doc/codelab: getTitle referenced before definition in Web Application Codelab
body:
by **jjinux@google.com**: 
On "Codelab: Writing Web Applications" (http://golang.org/doc/codelab/wiki/)
in the section, "Handling non-existent pages", getTitle() is used even though
it isn't documented until a later section.  I suspect that someone edited the tutorial
and accidentally copied a later version of the code.  I'm guessing that the code should
probably say:

title := r.URL.Path[lenPath:]
